recommended_degree: Psikologi, Hukum, Manajemen, Administrasi, Administrasi Bisnis (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Provide administrative support to Human Capital Administration Team and assisting with day-to-day Human Capital Administration Team operations.

2. Maintain and organize files and documentation related to the Human Capital Administration, both digitally and physically.

3. Perform data entry and update Human Capital Administration databases with relevant information.
